methods.name: glm::float_distance
methods.parameters: const T &x, const T &y
methods.short:
Return the distance in the number of ULP between 2 scalars.

See also: gtc_ulp

Return the distance in the number of ULP between 2 vectors.

See also: gtc_ulp

methods.name: glm::next_float
methods.short:
Return the next ULP value(s) after the input value(s).

See also: gtc_ulp

methods.name: glm::next_float
methods.parameters: const genType &x, const glm::uint &Distance
methods.short:
Return the value(s) ULP distance after the input value(s).

See also: gtc_ulp

methods.name: glm::prev_float
methods.short:
Return the previous ULP value(s) before the input value(s).

See also: gtc_ulp

methods.name: glm::prev_float
methods.parameters: const genType &x, const glm::uint &Distance
methods.short:
Return the value(s) ULP distance before the input value(s).

See also: gtc_ulp
